negotiator.session

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • listener.DefaultListenable<NegotiationEvent>
      • negotiator.session.SessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Listenable<NegotiationEvent>

    public class SessionManager
extends DefaultListenable<NegotiationEvent>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The SessionManager is responsible for enforcing the MultilateralProtocol during the Session. This is the entry point for the negotiation algorithm. The protocol and session parameters are passed on from the GUI. This logs all events to the Listener. You need to subscribe to hear the log events, eg for display or for writing to file.
    Author:
    David Festen

    • Constructor Detail

      • SessionManager

        public SessionManager(java.util.List<NegotiationPartyInternal> theparties,
                      Session session,
                      ExecutorWithTimeout exec)
        Initializes a new instance of the SessionManager object. After initialization this SessionManager can be run().
        Parameters:
        theparties - The parties to use in this session (including agents and optionally mediators)
        session - A session object containing preset information (can also be a new instance)
        exec - the executor to use when running

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run and wait for completion. Can be used from a thread. Throws from the underlying call are wrapped in a RuntimeException because run() doesn't allow throwing checked exceptions.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • runAndWait

        public void runAndWait()
                throws ActionException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                       NegotiationPartyTimeoutException
        Runs the negotiation session and wait for it to complete. If an error occurs, we still try to log the last agreement and call the parties that the session ended.
        Throws:
        NegotiationPartyTimeoutException
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        ActionException
